ValidationRule.description: Fields included in the Home Office checklist cannot be edited after Stage = Negotiation (i.e. in stages Close Agreement, Closed Won/Lost and Target).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(Products_In_Scope_Text__c, 'Home Office'), OR( TEXT(StageName) = 'Close Agreement', TEXT(StageName) = 'Closed Won', TEXT(StageName) = 'Closed Lost', TEXT(StageName) = 'Target'), OR( ISCHANGED(Number_of_Connections__c), ISCHANGED(Need_Help_With_Data_Collection__c), ISCHANGED(Home_Office_Product_Preference__c), ISCHANGED(Need_Customer_Project_Manager__c), ISCHANGED(Agreement_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Implementation_Period_weeks__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fields included in the Home Office checklist cannot be edited after Stage = Negotiation (i.e. in stages Close Agreement, Closed Won/Lost and Target).
